title: FS: Hoblitzell, Chase, Dorner, Howell, Willett - REDUCTIONS
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: FS: Hoblitzell, Chase, Dorner, Howell, Willett - REDUCTIONS
posts.post_content:
Prices include shipping in a bubble mailer. I will also consider all offers. Paypal FF please. If you would like me to email you higher resolution scans please let me know.


Hoblitzell PSA 3 missing red ink. Neither a beater nor faded overall like so many cards said to be missing red ink: Keeping it for now
  * This is a big price drop, more details on this card are in another thread:  [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=204647&highlight=missing[/url]


Chase Pink Portrait SGC 10 with PB White Owner's Stamp: $50 - SOLD

Dorner PSA 3 Heavy Red Ink (Vibrant Card): [STRIKE]$40[/STRIKE] $35

Howell Raw: [STRIKE]$40[/STRIKE] $30 - SOLD

Willet: $10 (envelope) $12 (bubble mailer)
